description: Testing all arrivals could create complacency over Manx isolation rules, the chief minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man border tests 'waste of resources', says chief minister
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man border tests 'waste of resources', says chief minister - BBC News
maintext: He added: "The advice we received from our medics and from our director of public health is that testing at the borders when you haven't got it in the community is a waste of resources."
